'''''Other Minds'' 27''' is the twenty-seventh issue of ''[[Other Minds]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and other role playing games set in Middle-earth, published in February 2024.

==Contents==
* "Editorial: A New Year!"
** By [[Thomas Morwinsky]]
* "The Road Goes Ever On"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "The Chronicle of Curandir"
** By Dale Davis
* "The Rangers of the North"
** By Thomas Morwinsky and Gabriele Quaglia
* "Lord of the Rings Roleplaying 5E House Rule: Spellcasting"
** By Charlie Bell
* "The Gwaith-i-Luthryn"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "On a Knife's Edge"
** By Andreas Erdmann
* "Review: Tales from the Lone Lands"
** By José Enrique Vacas de la Rosa
